analysis: The job responsibilities include building optimized deep learning architectures in the latest AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generated Content) or LLM (Large Language Models) domains, which directly indicates involvement with Generative AI and language models. Overall, the responsibilities and skills align with working in the field of Generative AI and language models.
